title: Multimedia-Based Practical Training for Innovations in Food Animal Production

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational livestock management theory, farm operation experience, basic food safety concepts
context.additional_context: Practice-centered training for working professionals with high job relevance; flexible learning environments using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of feed formulation for food animals with 90% accuracy using multimedia simulation tools.
Learners can present three or more design standards for animal welfare facilities using real-time video conferencing systems and 3D modeling resources.
Learners can explain food safety crisis management processes step-by-step by analyzing interactive case studies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
